title.narrative: Integrated Development for Increased Rural Climate Resilience in the Niger Basin

description.narrative: Component 1 (IW) Building6 increased water security and climate resilience at regional level,Component 2 (IW): Building climate resilience at sub-basin and watershed level in the Niger Basin,Component 3 (IW): Capacity building at regional, national and community level,Component 4 (STAR): Sustainable land and forest management for climate change mitigation and improved livelihoods in Burkina Faso,Project Management Cost
